appointment_confirmation.template: Hi {customer_name}, this confirms your {service_type} appointment on {date} at {time}. Reply Y to confirm or call us to reschedule.

emergency_response.template: ðŸš¨ URGENT: {customer_name}, we received your emergency about {issue_type}. Our team is dispatching immediately. ETA: {eta}. Stay safe!
emergency_response.description: Emergency response with immediate dispatch notification

quote_response.template: Hi {customer_name}, for {service_description} the estimated cost is ${min_price}-${max_price}. This includes {included_services}. Would you like to schedule?

business_hours_response.template: Hi! Thanks for contacting 757 Handy. Our office hours are 8AM-6PM Mon-Fri. For emergencies, reply URGENT. We'll respond first thing tomorrow!

test_greeting.template: Hello {customer_name}\! Thanks for contacting 757 Handy. How can I help you today?
test_greeting.fallback: Hello\! Thanks for contacting 757 Handy. How can I help you today?

quote_delivery.template: Hi {customer_name}! Your {service_type} quote is ready. Total: ${amount}. Valid for 30 days. Book now?
quote_delivery.fallback: Your quote is ready! Contact us to review the details.
